snippet: Wealthy Chinese clubs are unlikely to lure Jose Mourinho away from England as the Manchester United manager says he is enjoying the challenge of competing in the Premier League....

headline.main: Mourinho 'Too Young' to Be Tempted by Chinese Riches
headline.print_headline: Mourinho 'Too Young' to Be Tempted by Chinese Riches

lead_paragraph: Wealthy Chinese clubs are unlikely to lure Jose Mourinho away from England as the Manchester United manager says he is enjoying the challenge of competing in the Premier League.

snippet: Fear of missing out on English football's biggest ever payday drove the Premier League's relegation-threatened clubs on a spending spree in January, with Championship sides hoping for promotion also splashing the cash....

headline.main: Fear of Missing Out Drives English Club Spending
headline.print_headline: Fear of Missing Out Drives English Club Spending

lead_paragraph: Fear of missing out on English football's biggest ever payday drove the Premier League's relegation-threatened clubs on a spending spree in January, with Championship sides hoping for promotion also splashing the cash.

snippet: English soccer fans used to spend the summer ticking off the hours until the first day of the season in August but now the action kicks off on July 1 when the transfer window officially opens....

headline.main: English Clubs Start to Spend New-Found Riches
headline.print_headline: English Clubs Start to Spend New-Found Riches

lead_paragraph: English soccer fans used to spend the summer ticking off the hours until the first day of the season in August but now the action kicks off on July 1 when the transfer window officially opens.

snippet: Tottenham Hotspur have suffered so many false dawns that even their most ardent fans had long given up hope of their team ever winning the league title but Sunday's 2-1 victory at Manchester City has changed all that....

headline.main: Spurs Now the Real Deal After Win Over Man City
headline.print_headline: Spurs Now the Real Deal After Win Over Man City

lead_paragraph: Tottenham Hotspur have suffered so many false dawns that even their most ardent fans had long given up hope of their team ever winning the league title but Sunday's 2-1 victory at Manchester City has changed all that.

snippet: Midfielder Moussa Sissoko said he was not hurt by criticism from Mauricio Pochettino but instead used his manager's comments to motivate himself to find his feet at Tottenham Hotspur....

headline.main: Sissoko Getting Used to Manager Pochettino's Style at Spurs
headline.print_headline: Sissoko Getting Used to Manager Pochettino's Style at Spurs

lead_paragraph: Midfielder Moussa Sissoko said he was not hurt by criticism from Mauricio Pochettino but instead used his manager's comments to motivate himself to find his feet at Tottenham Hotspur.

snippet: Nigeria striker Odion Ighalo has signed a new five-year deal with Watford that will keep him at the club until 2021, the Premier League team said on their Twitter account on Thursday....

headline.main: Striker Ighalo Signs New Five-Year Deal With Watford
headline.print_headline: Striker Ighalo Signs New Five-Year Deal With Watford

lead_paragraph: Nigeria striker Odion Ighalo has signed a new five-year deal with Watford that will keep him at the club until 2021, the Premier League team said on their Twitter account on Thursday.

snippet: Premier League clubs will still be able to sign the best foreign players despite the result of the European Union referendum and the impending Brexit, Professional Footballers' Association chief Gordon Taylor said on Friday....

headline.main: PFA Chief Vows to Protect EU Players After Brexit Vote
headline.print_headline: PFA Chief Vows to Protect EU Players After Brexit Vote

lead_paragraph: Premier League clubs will still be able to sign the best foreign players despite the result of the European Union referendum and the impending Brexit, Professional Footballers' Association chief Gordon Taylor said on Friday.

snippet: It is easy to look back on Bob Bradley's 85 days as the first American coach in the English Premier League and say he got things badly wrong at Swansea....

lead_paragraph: It is easy to look back on Bob Bradley's 85 days as the first American coach in the English Premier League and say he got things badly wrong at Swansea.

snippet: Former Newcastle United manager Kevin Keegan has criticised owner Mike Ashley, saying the club has suffered from mismanagement at "the very top"....
lead_paragraph: Former Newcastle United manager Kevin Keegan has criticised owner Mike Ashley, saying the club has suffered from mismanagement at "the very top".

snippet: Montpellier have signed former West Bromwich Albion midfielder Stephane Sessegnon on a two-year contract, the Ligue 1 club have said....

headline.main: Montpellier Sign Former West Brom Midfielder Sessegnon
headline.print_headline: Montpellier Sign Former West Brom Midfielder Sessegnon
